text:
e="preserve">The Volkswagen Caddy is a van produced by Volkswagen in four generations since 1979.
First generation.
The first generation Caddy were produced from 1979 until 1996. It was based on the Volkswagen Golf Mk1.
Second generation.
The second generation was produced from 1995 until 2004. Two versions were available: a van based on the Volkswagen Polo Mk3, and a pickup truck based on the Škoda Felicia.
Third generation.
The third generation was produced from 2003 to 2020. It is based on the Volkswagen Golf Mk5.
Fourth generation.
The fourth generation was launched in 2020. It is based on the Volkswagen Golf Mk8.
